page.title: 14FARMING PRACTICE IN FORD
page.content: My name is Andrew.We live at Whiston Villa Farm.At the beginning of the year we plough the fields, then we cultivate and drill them with spring corn.Weedkiller is sprayed on.2 or 3 other fields are sown with sugar beet.The grass fields are fertilized and the beet is sprayed.By May the first cut of silage is made using a Forage Harvester.Hay is cut/baled in mid-June.The 2nd silage crop is taken in July.The winter corn sown the previous year is combined.Straw is baled for animal bedding. In the Autumn the spring corn, wheat ,beet etc. are harvested.Winter corn is sown after ploughing in the stubble. A lot of use is made of machines on the farm e.g. tractors, combine harvesters, balers. There is a 4 year rotation of crops. The year depends on the weather.
